reviews.review: La comunidad es un poco toxica, pero en niveles bajos se agradece la buena gente y el buen rollo que hay, muy buen juego y muy recomendado pero mala comunidad.
I started watching videos and just got into it
бегаешь или убегаешь гены твоё всё
Es macht spaß mit freunden es zu spielen aber auch allein mit fremden. Ein gutes spiel für Allgemein Horror!

I just bought a game, wanna be scared and iterested of surviving as like as feel myself one of the best ever known killers! First is good, rest is crap.
What's going on with the matchmaking system??? As a new player of for a fee game, i want to get all the experiense that developers can offer to me! Not to play one part of game to raise my some type of level, not to do something  strange with my steam region settings, not to try to wait 20+ minutes for killer match! What the matter with you, Dev's? I DEFINITELY LOVE THIS GAME AND DEFINITELY WON'T PLAY IT ANY MORE! So sad...
КАРОЧЕ БЕЖИШЬ ПО ЛЕСУ И ТЯ УБИВАЮТ СТРАШНА НЕ РИКАМЕНДУЮ

It's a good game... if you're willing to spend thousands of hours on perfecting your skill just for some random person that you've never met to tell you that you're trash at playing based on one match against them. Oh, and let's not forget the 69 thousand glitches that appear every patch/update and useless things the devs add/change/remove, even though nobody complained about them! Get this looovely game now for whatever price it has atm! Dead By Daylight - We Make It, You Hate It.

Edit: Sorry. I was salty. There's obviously going to be at least one person that will trashtalk every once in a while, so be prepared for that if you're planning on getting this game. Anyways, this game is... neutral but more towards bad. It can be fun or not, depending on your mindset. Have a positive mood in general=enjoying the game more. The opposite=enjoying the game less <3
Really good game they are still  fixing the game and adding a lot of new things <3
렉도 있고 그래서 추천은 못 하겠어요. 세일 할 때 사면 돈 값은 해요.  하기 전에는 고인물 겜이라 걱정했는데 살인마 안 하면 생각보다 괜찮아요. 저랭에는 생존자 놀아주는 즐겜하는 살인마 생각보다 많아요.

ДЕРМО ЕБАНОЕ ПРОСТО НИКОМУ НЕ СОВЕТУЮ ПОКУПАТЬ ЭТОТ ВЫСЕР, ДРОПАЕШЬ ПАЛЛЕТУ С 1 СТОРОНЫ И ОКАЗЫВАЕШЬСЯ С ДРУГОЙ, ЗАСТРЕВАЕШЬ В КРЮКАХ, НА 12 РАНГЕ ИГРАЕШЬ ПРОТИВ 1-4, НА 50 УРОВНЕ НА КЛОДЕТКЕ ИМЕЕШЬ НАЧАЛЬНЫЕ ПЕРКИ ЭТОГО ПЕРСА ПЕРВОГО УРОВНЯ, 1 РАЗ ПОПАЛ НА КРЮК, ТЕБЯ СНИМУТ, МАН ПРОМАХНЕТСЯ  НО ВСЕ ЖЕ УБЬЕТ ТЕБЯ И ТЫ БЛЯТЬ СКИПНЕШЬ 2 ФАЗУ И ПРОСТО НАХУЙ УМРЕШЬ НА КРЮКЕ ПОСЛЕ 1 ПОВЕШАНЬЯ, ПОСЛЕ ТЫ ПОЙДЕШЬ НЕКС И БУДЕШЬ ИГРАТЬ С ПАТИ ТОКСИКОВ КОТОРЫЕ СКООПЕРИРУЮТСЯ С МАНОМ И БУДУТ ПРИВОДИТЬ МАНА К ТЕБЕ И БУДУТ МЕШАТЬ ТЕБЕ УБЕГАТЬ ОТ НЕГО И ПОСЛЕ ТОГО КАК ТЫ ПОПАДЕШЬ НА КРЮК ОНИ БУДУЧИ ЗА ОДНО С МАНОМ БУДУТ ТЕБЯ СНИМАТЬ, СТОПИТЬ И ЖДАТЬ ПОКА ТЕБЯ ЕЩЕ РАЗ НАСАДЯТ НА КРЮК ЧТОБЫ СНЯТЬ ЕЩЕ РАЗ И ОПЯТЬ СПЕЦИАЛЬНО ЗАСТОПИТЬ ЧТОБЫ ТЫ НА 3 РАЗ УМЕР НАХУЙ НА КРЮКЕ ЕБАТЬ, ПРОСТО ЕБАНОЕ ДЕРЬМО НЕДОСТОЙНОЕ ДАЖЕ 10 КОПЕЕК, ЧТО УЖ ТУТ ГОВОРИТЬ ОНА БЛЯТЬ ДАЖЕ НЕ СТОИТ ТРАФИКА КОТОРЫЙ ЗАТРАЧЕН НА ЗАГРУЗКУ ЭТОГО ВЫСЕРА СЛОНИХИ.

BHVR should make russian players their own servers, they're always laggy, plays bad (gettin boosted by lags, 100km hits, etc. etc.) being toxic, typing in their language which no one really does care, camping and tunneling as killers (literally always..), I really like this game sometimes, but russians are breaking the game with their bad behaviour.

Very fun to play but hard in the start

At first this game did not appeal to me at all. I thought it was a fun gimmick that you could play with friends. I was honestly annoyed that it had been out for this long and the objective were still all the same.... start generators. After putting many hours into the game I came to realize how fun it actually is and competitive. The community is also great and i'm very happy they added the Archives. I recommend this to anyone.
Un juego frenético, divertido y adictivo. Aún tiene algunas cosillas que deben mejorar, pero por lo general se disfruta.

Si juegas de asesino creerás que los supervivientes están OP, si juegas de superviviente dirás lo mismo de los asesinos, pero vas a divertirte mucho intentando sobreponerte al otro, en especial si juegas con amigos. Un juego muy divertido y ahora hay servidores dedicados. Muy recomendado
ваша первая игра будит трудна но вы держитесь, удачи вам в игре, рекомендую.
It's amazing game! I like game idea, graphics look cool, movements etc. Community isn't that toxic, but not perfect either.

1) Katiller çok fazla güçlü olduğu için herkes katil oynamak istediğinden katil oynamaya kalkarsanız en az 10 dk maç bulmasını bekliyorsunuz.

2) Maç başladıktan sonra oyun uzadı diyelim ve haritadaki tüm paletleri düşürdünüz ve katilde o paletleri kırdı. Katilden kaçma şansınız büyük ölçüde azalıyor.

3) Çok uzun oyun bulma süresi var, oyunu şuan da oynamamın en büyük sebebedir. Oynadığım saatin %40 lobi de geçti.

Başlıca gördüğüm sorunlar bunlar ve bunlara çözüm bulunmalı !!

Играть невозможно. Поиск лобби длится дольше чем сама игра. Сплошной симулятор ожидания игры, в которой тебя загенрашит ебучая тима приматов

Интересная игра, хоть и чувствуется какое то однообразие, но очень влечет к себе. Да, долгое лобби не каждому даст нормально поиграть, некоторые баги тоже, но надеюсь когда нибудь это исправят. А так игре ставлю 10 Кладеток из 10

Es un juego bastante emocionante, los roles estan bien definidos, uno que otro bug que da risa o frustra a los demas, pero en general es un juego que se disfruta. Espero un dia valerme de un team para jugar lo, aunque apenas se las baces ya que no juego continuamente
îst ein super spiel mit tollem konzept
遊戲DLC新增的內容都很用心，只是遇到外掛會覺得賭爛

Ok, all-in-all, it's a great game to play when you have a group of friends, but don't let that discourage you from playing solo! You can find LFG in their discord server and get in a survivor queue instantly, or you can even play killer when you're solo. The worst part of this game, is honestly the extreme toxicity from the playerbase. If you're a first-timer killer and get your first 4k, get ready for the whiny survivors to say things such as:
"Baby killer"
"Hook camper"
"No skill"
"You would take mori"
"Get better internet"
Other than that great game.

garbage game.

Super toxic community, outright broken or glitchy gameplay experience, and its literally just a massive grind. 

I get you though, you want to play a killer and tactically dismantle a team of 4 survivors right? Well get used to 20-30 minute queue times then and still getting matched with 3 survivors who are 5 or 10 ranks higher than you with 1 survivor on par with you and get BMd the entire game.

Ok so just play survivor instead right? 

You'll jump immediately into a game in which 2 people hide in lockers or behind rocks and watch you die, the other will probably be trying to do objectives but more than likely run up and unhook you in front of the killer, allowing him to rehook and remove you from the game.

And then they'll sperg out and blame you in the lobby.

If you want to spend a lot of time and get little to no reward, this games for you.

Es macht verdammt Spaß und man wird schnell süchtig . Jedoch ist es nunmal ein rundenbasiertes Spiel und wird irgendwann sehr repetitiv , dementsprechend verliert man irgendwann , ob früher oder später die Lust
Love the game. You will love it, too.

Game is fun. Long wait times to get in. Level 18's getting matched with level 9 boosted killers kinda sucks. Crashing and disconnects with friends also slows everything down. The premise is awesome and I know they're working on it. Overall good game.
